titles.title: To amend the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to provide reimbursements for licensing and exam fees under the Veteran Rapid Retraining Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.
To amend the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 to provide reimbursements for licensing and exam fees under the Veteran Rapid Retraining Assistance Program of the Department of Veterans Affairs.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of Veterans Affairs to provide reimbursements for licensing and exam fees to eligible veterans under the Veteran Rapid Retraining Assistance Program.
